name: DD Chaney
text: Always PERFECT HOT FRESH  and kind workers every time I go. quick service on every visit

name: James Burton
text: I'd give them zero stars if it was available. This place never gets your order right and then when you demand your money back they told me it would be two weeks. I'd stay far away from this place.

name: Amber Miller
text: Convenient for me and the staff is always friendly but still not my favorite location.

name: Daniel Ray
text: There's no dining room at this unit, carry out or delivery only.  They were super busy on a Thursday evening when I was there and the staff looked overworked and understaffed.  I was worried, but the pizza and cheese sticks were very good and the front-end service was quite friendly all in all.

name: LBrooks Mo
text: After ordering from Pizza Hut in Killen for years and trying to support this local business, Pizza Hut has chosen to discontinue delivery to Saddlebrook even though it is a Killen address. Ironically Marco’s Pizza and Papa John’s Pizza will …More

name: Tanner Carr
text: 100% never on time. And 90% never get the correct order. I've waited over an hour after they said it would be done at a certain time. Very poorly ran establishment.

name: Daniel Kennamore
text: It's convenient, but it's pizza hut. So, they're always running behind and the pizza is extremely forgettable. However, the staff is friendly and helpful. They are the biggest redeeming quality for this location. It would be nice if they actually had enough people there all the time.

name: Tam Nguyem
text: I ordered delivery and it’s been about 40 mins and on the tracker it states that haven’t even finished the pasta let alone deliver it. Definitely not worth my money and time. It was only 2 pastas and 5 breadsticks.

name: Payne Correll
text: How many times they gonna forget the marinara sauce? How many times am I gonna have to re cut my own pizza? How many times they gonna get the order wrong? Every time.

name: Brittany Rudd
text: BY FAR THE WORST PIZZA HUT IVE EVER BEEN TO!!!!! DO NOT EAT HERE! Horrible service and even worse management. Do not waste your time.

name: Bethany Batchelor
text: We have ordered from this store on multiple occasions. Every time they mess up our address and our pizza is cold. Tonight broke the straw and I will NEVER order from them again. I ordered a large specialty pizza and i know it’s a holiday so …More

name: Matthew Stanley
text: This place is a little understaffed. But I tell you what the one person at a time that works there are amazingly fast.

name: Sheila Stephens
text: Pizza hut in the area is going downhill. Last few times not only has the pizza tasted funny, I've had one not even cut, another time the crust was hard and very brown....however, employees are friendly.

name: Mark Parker
text: Ordered on line. Pizza was done on time, but was cooked wrong. Ordered a supreme, which comes with veggies. Got a meat lovers instead. Common problem with this store.

name: A.M. Orr
text: Delivery service almost always gets the order wrong, sometimes repeatedly.  We were having a birthday party one time and ordered a pizza with no cheese for the birthday child.  They delivered a pizza with cheese.  They said they would make …More

name: mary crutcher
text: Made my pizza wrong twice in one order.  They need to go back to showing pizza at counter before you leave restaurant.

name: Darrjac M
text: We ordered 4 boxes of pizza. 2 out of 4 had hair under the pizza itself. Nasty to see . Never again pizza hut.

name: Donna Watkins
text: The best pizza

name: The hunnams’s family restaurant Hunnam
text: Y’all need to  expand  Your delivery to county road 111 Killen Alabama

name: Chris Vollrath
text: Killen, al has the worst customer service. If you order more than two large pan pizzas 90% of the time they will call your phone and tell you they are out of pan pizza and you need to switch to thin crust or hand. The only thing I can …More

name: Joshua Vanhorn
text: Great staff and pizza. They messed up my pizza one time, but made everything right by me. Every other time has been really fast

name: James Steward
text: Don't like the sauce very much

name: Deborah Green
text: Customers had to wait over double the time they were told when ordering their pizza...then you get there and wait another 30plus minutes. .only to find out they lost your pizza or they made you a pan crust instead of thin crust..so instead …More

name: Tara Schroeder
text: Great pizza

name: Kyle Baskins
text: Never had any issues with delivery. Pizza always hits the spot. Overall: well pleased.

name: Erica Standridge
text: We purchase pizza her often and we often get pizza with very little cheese and they have usually fixed it. Today we were told that if we wanted cheese to cover the whole pizza we would have to order extra cheese, which costs 1.50 per pizza. …More

name: Jeff McCrary
text: Good service. Order online for even better results!

name: Drew Newell
text: After a year of deliveries to our address, two orders were cancelled without notice. When I called to inquire, I was told it was because we were outside the delivery zone. They checked their records and found recent deliveries to my house but still refused. We are 4.5 miles from the restaurant.

name: Cheryl Elkins
text: Best Pizza in town Killen Al

name: angela zaccaria
text: Great food good prices!

name: Candace Cox
text: Pizza tasted like water cheese had no flavor

name: Kylee sweet
text:
They messed wings up...but made up for it later on case of the drive ...very fast and nice
5p

text: Good staff and we'll made pizzas.

text: Wish they delivered further out

name: Kris Kutt

name: Marlana Allison
text: I normally call in delivery orders and the person who delivers my food is very friendly and sometime it may be a few minutes late but always good and I let it slide.

text: called to order a pizza, was put on hold for over 9 minutes before I hung up to call dominos.

text: We live less than 5 miles away and they "don't deliver that far"
